alert.note: Alert for Laclede (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 8:32AM CDT until March 26 at 12:37PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Roubidoux Creek Near Waynesville affecting Pulaski County. Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County. Gasconade River at Hazelgreen affecting Laclede County. Gasconade River at Jerome affecting Phelps County. .Heavy rainfall through Friday will likely lead to the rivers rising above flood stage. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Gasconade River at Hazelgreen. * WHEN...From this evening to early Sunday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM CDT Friday the stage was 9.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 23.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
